GLOBAL_INSTRUCTIONS.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL_INSTRUCTIONS.instruction: Fill the entire form using BLACK INK and CAPITAL LETTERS only. Do not overwrite or use correction fluid.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters

APP_DATE.title: Application Date
APP_DATE.instruction: Enter the date you are submitting this form (DD-MM-YYYY).

APPLICANT_1_PERSONAL.title: Applicant 1: Personal Details
APPLICANT_1_PERSONAL.instruction: Enter the full name, Date of Birth, Gender, and Marital Status of the Primary Applicant. (If you have a CKYC number, enter it to skip other details).

APPLICANT_1_PARENTS.title: Applicant 1: Family Details
APPLICANT_1_PARENTS.instruction: You MUST provide at least one name: Father's Name, Spouse's Name, or Mother's Name.
rejections: All parent/spouse name fields left blank

APPLICANT_1_DOCS.title: Applicant 1: Identity Documents
APPLICANT_1_DOCS.instruction: Provide your PAN Number (Mandatory). If you do not have a PAN, you must attach Form 60. Also enter the last 4 digits of your Aadhaar.
rejections: PAN missing and Form 60 not attached

APPLICANT_1_ADDRESS.title: Applicant 1: Permanent Address
APPLICANT_1_ADDRESS.instruction: Enter your address exactly as it appears on your OVD (Officially Valid Document like Passport/Voter ID). Tick the box for the document you are using as proof.
rejections: Address does not match attached proof

APPLICANT_1_CONTACT.title: Applicant 1: Contact Details
APPLICANT_1_CONTACT.instruction: Enter a valid Mobile Number and Email ID. All bank alerts and OTPs will be sent here.

APPLICANT_1_OCCUPATION.title: Applicant 1: Occupation & Income
APPLICANT_1_OCCUPATION.instruction: Tick your occupation (Salaried/Self-Employed/Student etc.), Source of Income, and Gross Annual Income range.

APPLICANT_2_STATUS.title: Applicant 2: Existing Customer Status
APPLICANT_2_STATUS.instruction: If the second applicant is ALREADY an IDFC Bank customer, enter their Customer ID here and skip the personal details section. If new, leave blank and fill details below.

APPLICANT_2_PERSONAL.title: Applicant 2: Personal Details
APPLICANT_2_PERSONAL.instruction: Fill this ONLY for a Joint Account. Enter the Second Applicant's Name, DOB, Gender, and Relationship to the Primary Applicant.
rejections: Joint account selected but Applicant 2 details missing

PRODUCT_SELECTION.title: Account Product Selection
PRODUCT_SELECTION.instruction: Tick the type of account you want to open (e.g., 'Savings', 'Senior', 'Minor', 'Salary').

MODE_OF_OPERATION.title: Mode of Operation
MODE_OF_OPERATION.instruction:
Choose how the account will be used: 
1. 'Singly' (Only you).
2. 'Either or Survivor' (Any joint holder can operate).
3. 'Jointly' (Signatures of ALL holders required for every transaction).

MINOR_ACCOUNT_DETAILS.title: Minor Account / Guardian Details
MINOR_ACCOUNT_DETAILS.instruction: Fill this ONLY if the account is for a Minor (under 18). Enter the Guardian's Customer ID, Relationship, and funding instructions.
rejections: Product is 'Minor' but Guardian details missing

DEBIT_CARD_REQ.title: Debit Card Request
DEBIT_CARD_REQ.instruction:
Tick 'Yes' if you want a Debit Card. Write the name you want printed on the card. 
Note: Accounts operated 'Jointly' cannot get Debit Cards.

SWEEP_OUT_FACILITY.title: Sweep Out Facility
SWEEP_OUT_FACILITY.instruction: Tick this box if you want excess balance in your savings account to automatically transfer to a Fixed Deposit (to earn higher interest).

NOMINATION_DETAILS.title: Nomination
NOMINATION_DETAILS.instruction: Select 'Yes' to add a nominee (recommended) and fill their Name, Relation, and DOB. Select 'No' if you do not want a nominee.
rejections: Yes selected but Nominee Name missing

DECLARATION_SIGNATURES.title: Declaration & Signatures
DECLARATION_SIGNATURES.instruction: Paste recent colour photographs of all applicants. Sign across the photographs and in the signature boxes below.

BANK_USE_PAYMENT.title: Initial Payment Details
BANK_USE_PAYMENT.instruction: Bank Official Use: Enter details of the initial deposit (Cash/Cheque/NEFT amount and reference number).

BANK_USE_ONLY.title: For Bank Use Only
BANK_USE_ONLY.instruction: To be completed by bank staff for KYC verification, product coding, and approvals.

DOCUMENTS_REQUIRED.title: Supporting Documents
DOCUMENTS_REQUIRED.instruction: PAN/Form 60, photo identity proof, address proof, income proof, and business proof (where applicable) must be submitted. Requirements may vary by scheme.
